我们已经为您的Blockchain钱包添加了这些新的功能: 正在升级… 您的钱包正在升级，请耐心等待，所需时间将取决于你的钱包大小和现有版本的新旧 您的钱包已经升级完成！ 您现在正在运行最安全的Blockchain钱包。您现在可以继续使用了。 关闭 全部 意外错误，请稍后重试。 钱包升级失败 钱包升级出现错误。请稍后重试 您的Blockchain钱包安装未完成。请重新配对您的钱包或创建一个新钱包。
您将会通过一个仅查看地址接收比特币。您只有在访问私钥时才能支付这些资金。是否继续？
摄像头当前正被另一个应用程序占用。请关闭其他程序并重试。
正在验证密码… 正在验证PIN… 正在创建PIN… 正在解密钱包… 密码未更改 密码已更改 您的密码已经被更改，请重新配对您的钱包 您的验证邮箱将被用于当可疑或异常的活动时发送登录码，提醒您的钱包ID，以及当收到资金时发送比特币支付提醒。
显示余额 创建新地址 授权失败，请重试 发送失败，请重试
钱包更新已收到
您的设备似乎已经被root。提醒：在已root设备上存储资金是不安全的，并且还会导致稳定性问题。如果您继续在此设备上使用我们的比特币钱包，建议您对您的 Blockchain 账户使用双重加密 您的钱包已经包含了这个地址。 此时无法创建新地址。请重试。 正在保存地址…
Blockchain钱包无法在该设备运行。 标签 编辑 标签不能是空白 名称已被使用 警告
我们无法连接到主机以建立安全连接。请在继续之前检查您的网络连接和设备。 重试 退出 检测到屏幕覆盖! 使用屏幕覆盖的应用程序会欺骗你点击看不到的对象并可能窃取资金。请注意，屏幕调光应用程序也会触发该警告。若您确定没有威胁，您可继续操作。
此项目已存档， 在移动App中不可访问。您将无法从该项目发送资金，但所有资金是安全的。若取消存档该项目便可再次继续使用。 该项目未存档。若您不想再使用该项目，请对其进行存档。您的资金将是安全的，并且您可随时取消存档。 是否存档扫描到的地址？
1个地址已经被成功传输至我的比特币钱包。您要立即存档该地址吗？
%d 个地址已经被成功传输至我的比特币钱包。您要立即存档这些地址吗？
此项目已设置为您的默认项目，无法存档。 扩展的公钥 地址 复制xpub 扫描该码或将其复制到您的Blockchain商家App以安全接收比特币
分享您的 xPub 将会授权他人跟踪您的交易历史记录。获得授权的人可能会破坏您访问自己的钱包，因此，请仅与您信任的人分享 xPub。 指定一个友好的显示名称。 复制地址 存档 取消存档 您确定要存档该项目？ 您确定想要取消存档该项目？ 无法发送到同一个地址。 设为默认 需要私钥 此操作需要比特币地址 %1$s的私钥。请扫描二维码。 无效私钥 您将导入一个只看地址,这个地址（或公钥脚本）存储在钱包中当没有对应的私钥。这意味着资金只有你拥有存储在其他地方的私钥时才能被支出，如果您没有私钥，请不要指导任何人向该地址发送资金。 \n\n这些选项仅推荐高级用户使用。继续？
扫描私钥 私钥被成功导入。 注意：扫描到的私钥无法与您的只看地址相对应。 请扫描正确的私钥 只看 如果您是商家，展示您的xPub并使用Blockchain商家App安全和私密地接收资金。\n\n保持您的xPub私密。能够访问您的xpub的人将能够看到您所有的资金和交易历史记录
这是一个只看地址。要从这个钱包发送您的资金，请扫描您的私钥。
成功 默认 重试
转账 转账到导入的地址？ 您导入的地址下似乎有一些比特币。您的备份短语并没有备份您的导入地址。为了这些资金的安全，我们建议您将导入的地址中的资金转移到您的备份中。 可支付的地址 转账已确认 确认转账 全部转移 转账数量 转账后存档导入的地址

存档已确认
不要在问我。 交易手续费过低 自定义 数额 交易手续费会影响到比特币挖矿网络确认你的交易的速度，并且取决于当前网络条件。我们为当前交易推荐以下手续费。 不是现在 您指定了一笔异常高的手续费%1$s。\n\n即使您把手续费降低到%2$s，您的交易预计将会在下一个10分钟（1个区块）被确认。
你指定了一笔特别小的交易手续费%1$s.\n\n您的交易可能会被卡住甚至可能永远不会被确认。 为了将您的交易被确认的可能性增加到大约1小时（6个区块）以内，我们强烈建议手续费不低于%2$s。 提升手续费 降低手续费 保持高手续费 保持低手续费
没有确认的资金支出。 估计确认时间: ~%1$d分钟(%2$d个区块) 您的手续费太低，您的交易可能永远无法确认。 比特币挖矿网络目前交易活动频繁,这导致推荐的交易手续费比通常更高。 不支持钱包版本%1$s 注销 输入比特币地址或选择 输入比特币地址
更新 手机号码 配置文件 App 验证 重新发送 已验证 未验证 允许 阻止 安全性 启用 禁用 短信 谷歌认证 Yubikey 请首先在安全设置中通过短信禁用两步验证。 请在网络浏览器中登录您的钱包来禁用两步验证。 字段不能为空。 错误更新设置，请重试
需要访问摄像头 需要访问您的位置 需要编写内部存储。 未指定 更新失败。 验证手机号码 选择国家 我们已经向您的手机发送短信验证码，请输入该验证码来验证您的手机号。 验证码无效，请重试 您的手机能够用于启用双重认证,帮助确保您的钱包免遭未经授权的访问。
指纹解锁 两步验证 阻止Tor请求 阻止被认为是来自Tor匿名网络的IP地址。Tor网络经常被黑客用于尝试访问Blockchain用户的钱包。 启用截图 Some screens within the application can display sensitive data. Other applications will be able to access these screenshots.
Your Blockchain Wallet never communicates your password to our servers. This means we have no idea what your password is and we cannot reset it if you forget it. Create a memorable password hint that we can send to your verified email address in case you forget your password. Change Password Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you backup your funds from the side menu which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password. We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the link to verify your email address. Email Notifications Get notified when you receive bitcoin. Current Password New Password Mobile number verified Preferences Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet at %1$s
Rate Blockchain Wallet Enjoying the Blockchain Wallet? Please take a moment to leave a review in Google Play and let others know about it. Yes, rate Blockchain Wallet No, thanks Remind me later Why has my address changed? Information Learn More Log in to Web Wallet Go to %1$s on your computer. Select Log in via mobile Using your computer\'s camera, scan the QR code below. Show QR code Hide QR code Keep this code hidden until you\'re ready. Keep this code safe!\nDo not share with others.
Bitcoin payment request Please send%1$s BTC to the Bitcoin address %2$s. attached Tap to copy this address. Share it with the sender via email or text.
Warning The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone within 3 tries. Would you like to use this PIN anyway? Try again Continue
You have logged out or there was an error decrypting your wallet. Enter your password below to login. If you would like to forget this wallet and start over, press \'Forget Wallet\'. Forget wallet This will erase all wallet data on this device. Please confirm you have your wallet information saved elsewhere otherwise any bitcoin in this wallet will be inaccessible!!
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
This is an oversized bitcoin transaction. Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you\'ve received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.
Go back Accept higher fee "This transaction requires a higher fee for dust consumption due to the small amount of change to be returned." Be careful! Revealing this text allows your password to be copied to the clipboard, which can then be read by all applications on your device. Also be aware of people standing behind you!
SMS Notifications Enable notifications to receive an SMS whenever you receive bitcoin.
Transaction What\'s this for? Date Status Confirmed Pending (%1$s/%2$s Confirmations) "Transaction fee: %1$s" Value when received:\u0020 Value when transferred:\u0020 Value when sent:\u0020 Value:\u0020 Unknown No Inputs (Newly Generated Coins) May be at risk for a double spend. Verify on Blockchain.info Share transaction details Note
Check your email Check email We sent an email to %1$s. Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup. Email Address Add and verify your email address to receive alerts, prevent suspicious activity, and recover your Wallet ID if forgotten. Add Backup your funds For your security, we do not keep any passwords on file. Backup your wallet to ensure your bitcoins are safe in case you lose your password. Backup Prevent unauthorized access to your wallet. Enable 2-Step Verification to increase wallet security.
Backup Phrase For your security, Blockchain does not keep any passwords on file. The following 12 word Backup Phrase will give you access to your funds in case you lose your password. Be sure to write it on a piece of paper and to keep it somewhere safe and secure. Start backup It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear here and in this order. Backup Complete You can use your Backup Phrase to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your Backup Phrase can access your bitcoin so remember to keep it offline somewhere safe and secure. Backup again Backup confirmed Last backup: %1$s Enter the following words from your Backup Phrase to complete the backup process. NEXT WORD PREVIOUS WORD Word of Word Mismatch DONE Lost your 12 word backup phrase?
Use your fingerprint for faster, easier access to your wallet.\n\nConfirm fingerprint to continue Confirm fingerprint to continue Touch sensor Fingerprint login Fingerprint not recognized. Try again Fingerprint recognized Use PIN Are you sure you want to disable fingerprint login? No fingerprints have been registered to this device yet. Do you want to register a fingerprint now? Either the fingerprints stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled Keys invalidated, PIN code required There have been too many failed attempts in the last 30 minutes. Please attempt setup again later. There have been too many failed attempts. Please log in using your PIN instead. Unexpected error
Copy Address Copy receive address to another app Show Receive QR View QR code for receive address Sorry, there was an error generating the QR code Reveal a receive address when you long-press on the app icon in the launcher, making receiving bitcoin even faster.

What name does %1$s know you by? %1$s should scan this QR code with their Blockchain Wallet mobile app. How would you like to share this invite? Cannot be empty Via QR code (in-person) Using a link Scan a QR code Someone sent me a link Accept Invite If someone sent you a link, simply tap on the link to accept. I want to: Transactions with %1$s: No transactions yet Rename contact Delete contact Ask to send %1$s bitcoin Request bitcoin from %1$s Invalid QR code Contact request sent Just added Trusted Once removed, you will have to invite this contact again. Payment request Why would you like to send %1$s bitcoin? This is optional and will be shared with %1$s. Why would you like %1$s to send you bitcoin? This is optional and will be shared with %1$s. When they accept, we will notify you and you can complete the transaction. Send request Transaction not found Address sent successfully Sending address failed This will send an address to your contact. Proceed? Your contact has been informed that you wish to send them bitcoin and that you require an address from them. We will notify you when they have sent an address! Your contact has been informed that you wish to receive bitcoin from them and has been sent an address. We will notify you when they have sent you bitcoin! Checking messages failed, please try again We\'re just informing your contact that you\'ve sent them some bitcoin, please wait. Payment sent! We\'ve notified your contact to let them know that you\'ve completed the transaction. There was an error notifying your contact that you have sent them a payment. Please check your connection and try again. We couldn\'t connect you to the contacts service. Please retry to enable full functionality. Looks like you sent more bitcoin than was requested. You can request some back from your contact if you wish. We have not marked the payment as complete. Looks like you sent less bitcoin than was requested. Your contact will still receive the bitcoin you sent, but we have not marked the payment as complete. To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to use the Contacts functionality. In Progress Finished Request payment No confirmed contacts found! Are you sure you want to decline this pending transaction? Once you decline a payment, no further action can be taken. Are you sure you want to cancel this pending transaction? Once you cancel a payment, no further action can be taken. Start transaction Request payment Shared with %1$s Transactions must be accepted by your contact prior to sending Send to Contact
Transaction Started We have notified %1$s about your request to start a transaction. Request Sent Your payment request of %1$s has been sent to %2$s.
Awaiting Response ● Ready to Send Waiting for Payment ● Accept or Decline Payment Requested ● Pay or Decline Declined Cancelled Sent %1$s to %2$s Received %1$s from %2$s Received from %1$s Sent to %1$s Contacts make it easy to send and receive money from others. Introducing contacts You can now transact without the hassle of Bitcoin addresses. Add your first contact via the sidebar. It\'s simple and secure Select Contact Please select contact first.
Swipe to receive Reveal a receive address when you swipe left on the PIN screen, making receiving bitcoin even faster. Five addresses will be loaded consecutively, after which logging in is required to show new addresses. No more addresses can be loaded right now. Log in to the app to load more.
Fingerprint Login Use fingerprint login instead of your PIN to authenticate and access your wallet. Enable fingerprint I\'ll do this later Check Your Inbox Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup. Verify email Receive Bitcoin Current Price: QR Codes Scan Address We work with exchange partners all over the world, so you can buy bitcoin directly from your wallet. Send your wallet address to a friend to request bitcoin. An address is a string of random letters and numbers that change for each transaction. An address can also be shown as a QR code. Scan a friend’s QR code to quickly capture their wallet address.
Buy Bitcoin Get Bitcoin That\'s it for now! We’ll keep you up-to-date here with recommendations and new features. Start Over Skip All Trade Complete Your Buy Bitcoin trade has been completed! View details Available now Buy bitcoin directly from your mobile wallet. It\'s simple, seamless, and secure. The buy experience may be a little slow on your device. Thanks in advance for your patience. To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to use the Buy functionality.
Enter 2FA code Please enter a valid 2FA code from your authenticator app to continue. We have just sent you an SMS containing a 2FA code. Please enter it here to continue. 2FA code 2FA code cannot be empty 2FA code incorrect
Change fee Error getting fee options
Regular Priority Custom 1+ hour ~0–60 min Advanced users only %1$s sat/b Low fee not recommended Unnecessarily high fee This feature is recommended for advanced users only. By choosing a custom fee, you risk overpaying or your transaction never being confirmed. sat/b Regular: %1$s, Priority: %2$s
